org.funcito
Class Funcito

java.lang.Object
  org.funcito.Funcito

public class Funcito
extends Object

This class is a public entry point into Funcito for the supported functional framework APIs. Most users will probably prefer to use static imports from the particular API being used, such as FuncitoGuava, FuncitoFJ (Functional Java), or FuncitoJedi, because the usage is more terse. But for rare cases when multiple functional frameworks are being used within the same class, the static methods within this class can be used to distinguish between them. Example: 

 
     import static org.funcito.Funcito.*;
     import com.google.common.base.Function;
     import jedi.functional.Functor;
     import fj.F;
     import play.libs.F.Function;
     import org.apache.commons.collections15.Transformer;

     Function<MyClass,RetType>    function = guava().functionFor( callsTo(MyClass.class).someMethod());
     Functor<MyClass,RetType>     functor  = jedi().functorFor( callsTo(MyClass.class).someMethod());
     F<MyClass,RetType>           f        = fj().fFor( callsTo(MyClass.class).someMethod());
     F.Function<MyClass,RetType>  function = play2().functionFor( callsTo(MyClass.class).someMethod());
     Transformer<MyClass,RetType> xform    = collectGen().transformerFor( callsTo(MyClass.class).someMethod());

See Also:
FuncitoGuava, FuncitoFJ, FuncitoJedi, FuncitoPlay2, FuncitoCollectGen

Method Detail

callsTo

public static <T> T callsTo(Class<T> clazz)
Creates a mock instance of a class, for the purpose of capturing and wrapping faux calls to methods in that class. Return values of these faux method calls should be passed as the argument to one of the functional-object factory methods, preferably inline so it is apparent in one place what method is being wrapped. This callsTo() method is provided as a convenience when using the static delegate methods in this class. It is functionally interchangeable with calls through to the delegates' version of callsTo(), such as guava().callsTo().

Type Parameters:
T - the specific type of the class to be mocked
Parameters:
clazz - Class to be mocked
Returns:
mock instance of clazz, solely for invoking and capturing faux method calls

guava

public static GuavaDelegate guava()
Delegate method used to help differentiate Guava from other Funcito supported functional frameworks

Returns:
a delegate with all of the same methods as the static versions in FuncitoGuava.
See Also:
FuncitoGuava
